pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Tuesday, November 23, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet meeting.

Note for media:

  • Ministers will be available to media in the third floor foyer of West Block as of 11:00 a.m.

12:35 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Speech from the Throne procession and ceremony to officially open the first session of the 44th Parliament.

Senate of Canada
2 Rideau Street

Notes for media:

  • Pooled coverage
  • The Speech from the Throne will be broadcast live on television and online at: https://senparlvu.parl.gc.ca/Harmony/en/PowerBrowser/PowerBrowserV2/20200922/-1/10430
  • A livestream of the Speech from the Throne will be shared on social media on the following channels:
    • Twitter (@CanadianPM / @PMcanadien)
    • Facebook (Your Government at Work / Votre gouvernement à l’œuvre)
    • YouTube (Prime Minister of Canada / Premier ministre du Canada)

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the President of the Republic of Kosovo, Vjosa Osmani-Sadriu.

Office of the Prime Minister
West Block
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
